message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
